# Setup

```{r}
library(haven)   # this package allows us to read spss files
```

1. I will use data collected by HBSC research network.
2. The format of the data is spss file

Reading the data

```{r}
#path = file.path("C:/", "seminar", "HBSC 2014 5 countries.sav")
path <- file.path("data/Toktonova_1_HBSC_2014_5_countries.sav")  # Note: changed path, name, and inserted "_" in the file name
df = read_sav(path)
View(df)
```
